trans-unit.source: Base designer class for extending the design mode behavior of a root design document that supports nested components.
trans-unit.target: 擴充根設計文件支援巢狀的元件的設計模式行為的基底設計工具類別。

trans-unit.source: ComponentDocumentDesigner provides a base class for designers of root design documents that support nested components.
trans-unit.target: ComponentDocumentDesigner 支援巢狀的元件的根設計文件的設計工具提供的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class, ComponentDocumentDesigner implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface to provide a root-level design mode view for the associated component, and any nested components.
trans-unit.target: 除了方法和繼承自功能<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>類別，ComponentDocumentDesigner 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>介面，以提供根層級設計模式檢視相關聯的元件，和任何巢狀元件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The root-level design mode view for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> is typically provided by a built-in root designer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 的根層級設計模式檢視<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>通常由內建的根設計工具。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> implementation is required to provide a view for other types of root components in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>實作需要其他類型的根元件在設計模式中提供的檢視。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can associate a designer with a type using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 您可將設計工具關聯類型，使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> the designer is editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref>編輯設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified tool is supported by the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計工具是否支援指定的工具。

trans-unit.source: If a tool is supported, it will be enabled in the toolbox when the designer regains focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果支援的工具，將會啟用在 [工具箱] 設計工具重新取得焦點時。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 否則，它將會停用。

trans-unit.source: Once a tool is marked as enabled or disabled it cannot be queried again.
trans-unit.target: 一旦標記的工具為啟用或停用它無法再次查詢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to test for toolbox support.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>來測試 [工具箱] 支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool should be enabled on the toolbox; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer doesn't know how to use the tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 [工具箱]; 上應該啟用此工具<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果文件設計工具並不知道如何使用工具。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用指定的元件在設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>與設計工具產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the set of properties the component will expose through a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 調整的元件會透過公開的屬性集<xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter> interface method override adds a non-browsable, design-time only `boolean` property named "TrayLargeIcon" to this designer's component at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter>介面方法的覆寫將不可瀏覽、 設計階段只`boolean`屬性在設計階段將名為"TrayLargeIcon 」 到這個設計工具元件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerFilter>

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the component tray.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是由元件匣。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the properties for the class of the component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，其中包含元件的類別屬性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> that indicates a particular view technology.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"> </xref> ，指出特定檢視技術。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the view for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示這個設計工具的檢視。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner.SupportedTechnologies%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IRootDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An array of supported <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 陣列支援<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService.FilterAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentDocumentDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The component to filter the attributes of.
trans-unit.target: 要篩選的屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of attributes that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改的屬性的字典。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered attributes is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已篩選屬性集的快取。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果篩選器服務必須再次查詢。

trans-unit.target: 要篩選事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of events that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改的事件字典。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the set of filtered events is to be cached; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the filter service must query again.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>篩選的事件集是否要快取。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果篩選器服務必須再次查詢。

trans-unit.target: 要篩選屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: A dictionary of properties that can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 可修改的屬性的字典。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>来測試 [工具箱] 支援。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the tool is supported by the toolbox and can be enabled; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the document designer does not know how to use the tool.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果該工具支援工具箱 中，可以啟用。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果文件設計工具不知道如何使用此工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"></xref> to select.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ToolboxItem"> </xref>選取。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component tray for the designer is in auto-arrange mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否元件匣中的設計工具會自動排列模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component tray for the designer is in auto-arrange mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>設計工具元件匣中是否自動排列模式;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the component tray for the designer is in large icon mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出元件匣中的設計工具是否為大型圖示模式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component tray for the designer is in large icon mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果元件匣中的設計工具是在大型圖示模式;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
